fr.liglab.adele.cilia.runtime

Class CiliaInstanceWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • fr.liglab.adele.cilia.runtime.CiliaInstanceWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CiliaInstance, org.apache.felix.ipojo.InstanceStateListener, org.apache.felix.ipojo.util.TrackerCustomizer

    public class CiliaInstanceWrapper
extends Observable
implements CiliaInstance, org.apache.felix.ipojo.util.TrackerCustomizer, org.apache.felix.ipojo.InstanceStateListener
    This class wraps a Pojo object, their instance and their factory.
    Author:
    Cilia Project Team

    • Constructor Detail

      • CiliaInstanceWrapper

        public CiliaInstanceWrapper(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context,
                    String instanceName,
                    String filter,
                    Dictionary props,
                    Observer obs)
        Create an iPOJO wrap instance.
        Parameters:
        context - The OSGi bundle context.
        instanceName - The name of the instance, this is not the iPOJO instance name, is an abstract name.
        filter - A filter to search the iPOJO factory which will create the instance.
        props - Properties used when creating the instance.
        obs - The observer reference.

        public void refresh()
        Will notify the observers there is a change in the instance status. It notify only true, when the instance is valid, and false, when the instance is invalid.
